transcript:
the conversation might happen to flag. As the fore- man of a spinning mill, when he has set the hands to work, goes round and notices here a 
spindle that has stopped or there one that creaks or makes more noise than it should, and hastens to check the machine or set it in proper motion, so Anna Pavlovna moved about her drawing room, approaching now a silent, now a too-noisy group, and by a word or slight re- arrangement kept the conversational machine in steady, proper, and regular motion. B
